MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G44 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Clarkston Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have started excavation work on the underground cable fault in the area but due to difficult digging condition and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6:15am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50am on 17th April 2021.
